title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Human body : musculo-skeletal system; Physical properties of bones and muscles; Idealization of musculo-skeletal system; Kinematics and kinetics of rigid bodies; Eulerâs equation; Lagrange s equation; spring, mass, dashpot system; Sports mechanics; Computer simulation of different atheletic activities; Design of prosthetics and other accessories; Introduction to mechanics of other improtant limbs : lungs, heart
